meanings.sent1: My grandfather used to talk about the peseta when he was young.
meanings.sent2: In the past, people in Spain used the peseta to buy things.
meanings.sent3: I found an old coin from the peseta era in a dusty drawer.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the peseta are like faded photographs in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The peseta symbolizes a bygone era of Spanish history.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Spain before the adoption of the euro.
meanings.sent1: Before the euro, the peseta was the main currency in Spain.
meanings.sent2: Shops displayed prices in both pesetas and euros during the transition period.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could travel back in time and spend a day using only pesetas.
meanings.sent4: The peseta stands as a reminder of a time when Spain had its own currency.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together brings back memories of the peseta.
